name: Fedaykin officer suit
data: It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution pathetically.
It has low armour class for its type (average in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance strongly.
It modifies the user's resistance to acid damage.
